title: JAAL 1.1 event
description: An event in JAAL 1.1 recording. An event is a time-dependent user action.

time.description: A time in milliseconds from the start of the simulation.

object.description: Reference to a JAAL data structure or the Undo button.

gradable.description: Boolean value to indicate whether the current event is considered a gradable step.

image.description: A string containing an SVG representation of the image
